advice1: Be a strong woman so your daughter will have a role model and your son will know what to look for in a woman when he’s a man.

advice2: You really have to look inside yourself and find your own inner strength, and say, I’m proud of what I am and who I am.

advice3: No matter what kind of challenges or difficulties or painful situations you go through in your life, we all have something deep within us that we can reach down and find the inner strength to get through them.

advice4: Go within every day and find the inner strength so that the world will not blow your candle out.

advice5: Fight for the things that you care about, but do it in a way that will lead others to join you.
Don’t be afraid. Be focused. Be determined. Be hopeful. Be empowered.
